info.description: Human Resource Information System API with authentication and comprehensive HRIS modules
info.title: HRIS API

get.description: Retrieve all attendance records with optional filters and pagination

post.description: Record clock-in time for an employee

400.description: Invalid request or already clocked in

post.description: Bulk import attendance records from an Excel (.xlsx) file. Required columns: employee_number, date, status. Optional columns: clock_in, clock_out, overtime_hours, notes. Valid statuses: hadir, alpha, terlambat, izin, sakit, cuti.

200.description: Import result with imported count and errors

get.description: Retrieve an attendance record by its ID

put.description: Update an existing attendance record by ID

delete.description: Delete an attendance record by ID

put.description: Record clock-out time for an existing attendance record

400.description: Invalid request or already clocked out

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns access token and sets refresh token in cookie
Clear refresh token cookie to logout user
Generate new access token using refresh token from cookie

401.description: Unauthorized - refresh token not found or invalid

get.description: Retrieve all companies
Retrieve a company by its ID

put.description: Update an existing company by ID

get.description: Retrieve all departments, optionally filtered by company
Retrieve a department by its ID

put.description: Update an existing department by ID

get.description: Retrieve all employee salary records, optionally filtered by employee

post.description: Create a new salary record for an employee

get.description: Retrieve the most recent salary record for a specific employee
get.summary: Get latest salary for an employee

get.description: Retrieve an employee salary record by its ID

put.description: Update an existing salary record by ID

delete.description: Delete an employee salary record by ID

get.description: Retrieve all employees, optionally filtered by company

post.description: Create a new employee record linked to a user account

get.description: Retrieve the employee profile of the currently authenticated user
Retrieve an employee by their ID

put.description: Update an existing employee record by ID

delete.description: Delete an employee record by ID

get.description: Retrieve all holidays, optionally filtered by company and/or year
Retrieve a holiday by its ID

put.description: Update an existing holiday by ID

get.description: Retrieve all leave requests, optionally filtered by employee or status
Retrieve a leave request by its ID

put.description: Update an existing leave request by ID

delete.description: Delete a leave request by ID

put.description: Approve or reject a pending leave request (Admin/HR only)
put.summary: Approve or reject a leave request

get.description: Retrieve all user menu access mappings (Admin only)

post.description: Set the menu keys accessible to a specific user (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve the list of menu keys accessible to the currently authenticated user

delete.description: Delete custom menu access for a user, reverting to role defaults (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve the hierarchical organization structure for a company (departments  positions  employees)
Retrieve all payroll records, optionally filtered by employee, month, and year

post.description: Generate a payroll record for an employee for a specific month and year

get.description: Retrieve a payroll record by its ID

put.description: Update an existing payroll record by ID

delete.description: Delete a payroll record by ID

put.description: Update the status of a payroll record (draft, processed, paid)

get.description: Retrieve all positions, optionally filtered by company
Retrieve a position by its ID

put.description: Update an existing position by ID

get.description: Retrieve all shifts, optionally filtered by company
Retrieve a shift by its ID

put.description: Update an existing shift by ID

get.description: Retrieve all users (admin and hr only)

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

get.description: Retrieve currently authenticated user's information
Retrieve user by ID (admin, hr, or self)

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

delete.description: Delete a user by ID (admin only, cannot delete self)

400.description: Cannot delete your own account or user not found

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
